title: ECS Cryptox
author: ECS Cryptox
content: Neya ek coin jo abhi tak launch vhi nehi hua hea, launch hoyega 1 Sep me probably. Twitter me kafi hype dekh raha tha me. Kisiko kuch pata hea es coin k bareme? Mene thoda bohot research kia hea ab idhar aya hoon to get more from others.

comments.author: John_Titor
comments.body: Did a bit research on it. And in my opinion it can change the islamic finance industry. Especially in dubai where crypto is highly adopted. Project gathered big funds and members. Can be rivals of projects like Apt, arb, sei etc.
